version_description:
- 80 action-packed levels and 6 amazing running worlds.
- 7 characters and 5 buddies who help you complete the levels. - Chests, daily missions and loads of candy!
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

ENDLESS RUNNING: How far can you run while collecting candy? 
SPECIAL ABILITIES: Activate “Superhero”, “Candy Princess”, “Hamster Ball” and many other special abilities. 
SWAP RUNNERS: Continue running with a second character when you crash out with the first one.

解锁新世界：尽可能多地收集糖果，在甜蜜的新世界追逐强盗。
新角色：你肯定想不到特工安吉拉、夏威夷汉克狗和消防员金杰猫的特殊能力有多神奇！

解锁新世界：尽可能多地收集糖果，在甜蜜的新世界追逐强盗。
新角色：你肯定想不到特工安吉拉、夏威夷汉克狗和消防员金杰猫的特殊能力有多神奇！
几处缺陷修复和小游戏改进。
